#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int m,n,p,a,b;
cin>>m>>n>>p;
long long grid[m+1][n+1];
memset(grid,0,sizeof(grid));

for(int i=0;i<p;i++)
{
	cin>>a>>b;
	grid[a][b]=-1;
}
if(grid[1][1]==-1)
{	cout<<"0"<<endl;
	return 0;
}
for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
{
	if(grid[i][1]==0)
	grid[i][1]=1;
else 
break;
}
for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
{
		if(grid[1][i]==0)
		grid[1][i]=1;
else 
break;
}
for(int i=2;i<=m;i++)
{for(int j=2;j<=n;j++)
{
if(grid[i][j]==-1)
continue;
if(grid[i-1][j]>0) grid[i][j]=(grid[i][j]+grid[i-1][j]+mod)%mod;
if(grid[i][j-1]>0) grid[i][j]=(grid[i][j]+grid[i][j-1]+mod)%mod;
}
}
if(grid[m][n]>0)
cout<<grid[m][n]<<endl;
else
cout<<0<<endl;
return 0;
}
